title: Ch4.Unreported.World.2015.The.Fight.for.Sight.720p.HDTV.x264.AAC
description:
The Fight for Sight

Health-Medical Documentary hosted by Ade Adepitan, published by Channel 4 broadcasted as part of CH4 Unreported World series in 2015 - English narration
 
http://docuwiki.net/images/1/1c/The-Fight-for-Sight-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

The Fight for Sight
Reporter Ade Adepitan observes the medics treating impoverished patients in Malawi. Against the odds, they organise and perform 15-minute operations that allow blind people to see. Some of those receiving treatment are elderly, while others are teenage children who have never seen before, but in all cases the transformation in their lives is immense and deeply moving to witness.
